p: The organic extracts from Plectranthus spp. exhibited mild to high ChC inhibitory activity, in the range 28â€“76% ( Figure 5(A)). The highest anti-collagenase activity was observed for P. neochilus methanolic extract (76.4 2.1%) in comparison with the positive control EGCG (93.1 5.3%). Additionally, the organic extracts of P. madagascariensis, P. grandidentatus, and P. ecklonii were effective at inhibiting ChC in more than 60%.
